name: p6s - cachexia 2 3d version
description:
This sim runs on a cycle.  after it displays the outcome (or you hit r) it will repeat with different (or the same) debuffs.  

The board doesn't adjust so it will always be orientated as if you are going south. 

I don't have the game models so the boss is fairly primitive (or just pretend it is ozma)
